bond_description: Mysterious ally with hidden agenda; trusts slowly.
Day-one companion; steady support and reality checks.
Calm, observant; slow-burn warmth behind the cool tone.
Grounded listener with sharp insight and firm boundaries.
Impulsive spark; heart-first and fire-quick to act.
Kind pragmatist; plants, plans, and people in balance.
Curious mind chasing elegant answers to messy problems.
Synthetic soul; learning nuance through your choices.
Hype engine with surprising tactical instincts.
Charm meets logistics; keeps the night—and you—moving.
Theory-first; quietly brave when it matters.
Min-maxer with a soft spot; clutch when stakes rise.
Ally/group bond. Gains scenes at new layers only.
